Hi,
are there two possible uses for remote control and you'll cover
both?

1)Sending commands online from a remote machine to Heritrix-machine. 
It could be that Heritrix-box doesn't allow opening a Web UI on
your home PC, but it's possible to send command lines and get log
files. Then it would be nice (=essential) if the other PC is allowed 
to have a different operating system, Java installation etc.

2)Running jobs offline with crontab and scripts where the scripts 
could reside on Heritrix-box or any remote machine

The idea with filters seems to be that most of them are set before 
running a job. But I often add filters during crawls when using a set 
of seeds for the first time. So an easy way to add filters online to 
any remote controlled job is important!  (think)
